definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: The pig is already round and fat, and will be ready for slaughter next year.
sentences.chinese: 這頭豬已經長得滾瓜溜圓，來年就能出欄了。

sentences.english: His eyes were staring wide, now, and his breath suspended—waiting for the answer.
sentences.chinese: 他眼睛瞪得溜溜圓，張着口在等回答。
